oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stratification for module categories of finite group schemes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Benson, Dave
Iyengar, Srikanth B.
Krause, Henning
Pevtsova, Julia
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Representation Theory
16G10 (primary), 20C20, 20G10 20J06 (secondary)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The tensor ideal localising subcategories of the stable module category of all, including infinite dimensional, representations of a finite group scheme over a field of positive characteristic are classified. Various applications concerning the structure of the stable module category and the behavior of support and cosupport under restriction and induction are presented.
Comment: 36 pages. The revision corrects an error in the statement of Theorem 7.7, and also in the proof of Theorem 4.1. The main results of the paper remain unchanged
